extendedInfo.description: WELCOME TO GAME CENTRAL STATION! Hit the arcade and game-hop between 5 different arcade games all based on the film Wreck-it Ralph!Fix-it Felix Jr. ââ¢      Ralph wrecked it, now you get a chance to fix it!â¢      Awesome 8-bit graphics that pay homage to the classic arcade era.â¢      Climb, dodge and magic hammer your way to a high score!Heroâs Duty ââ¢      Suit up and play as Sergeant Calhoun and teach those cy-bugs a lesson theyâll never forget!â¢      Blast cy-bugs in level after level of bug clearing action.â¢      Grab different weapons and make your momma proud!Sweet Climber ââ¢      Itâs Ralphâs time to shine in an endless climbing game!â¢      Use tilt controls and fizzy jet packs to climb as high as possible.â¢      Jump from candy stalk to candy stalk, but watch out for weak branches!Turbo Timeââ¢      Enter the race for gold, and drive at turbo speed!â¢      Roll through fiery speed boosts and avoid obstacles to gain an edge over your competitors!â¢      Sweet 16-bit graphics that add a retro feel to this classic arcaderacer!Flight Commandââ¢      Fly to extreme distances in this exciting flight sim!â¢      Blast through waves of cy-bugs, and dodge explosive obstacles to become the toughest pilot around!â¢      Max out your high score by scoring huge multipliers and destroying everything in your path! Also compete against your friends - and the world - for high scores in each game!  Get to Game Central Station and start playing!Terms of Use: http://disneytermsofuse.com/

reviews.comment: Even greater than before the update, but it can still use minor improvements.\tRalph nows says, \"I\'m gonna wreck it!\" Just like he does in the movie, and I\'m grateful for that, but Felix saying, \"I can fix it!\" would be really nice. Also, is there no way we can have tilt controls in Turbotime? Besides that, this app is great!
reviews.author: Jensen Berlitz

reviews.title: Great value
reviews.comment: Fun games and they have released 2 additional free games since I purchased the app. Well worth the price as far as phone games go, and the app doesn\'t hit you up for money constantly like others. Great
reviews.author: Sean Anderson

reviews.title: mini games
reviews.comment: This is a set of mini games based on the movie. Game(s) are pretty decent, but are mostly based on other game styles that have been done better already.
reviews.author: Justin Green

reviews.title: Love it....but
reviews.comment: Every time I don\'t play it for a while, the next time I go to play it it doesn\'t let me. Says \"u fortunately has stopped\" so I have to uninstall and reinstall all over again. Which RUINS all scores :( otherwise a great game but needs that fixed.
reviews.author: Sara Perry

reviews.title: Appreciate the effort
reviews.comment: In porting the iOS features to work with Android. It now is at par with the iOS version. The upside is that this is best played with a bigger screen  However, it becomes unplayable if you are connected  to the internet. Probably, it has something to do with Facebook sync.
reviews.author: Ian Troy Alvaran

reviews.title: Waste of money
reviews.comment: Paid and downloaded but when my 5 year old tries to play all we get is a black screen!!
reviews.author: Claire Francis

reviews.title: Very fun
reviews.comment: After I saw the movie I\'ve been wanting to play the game & this app did it. This so can entertain me for a long time. But in future updates I would like to at least like to see Sugar Rush & if possible, Pac-man.
reviews.author: Camden m.

reviews.title: Crappy game
reviews.comment: Doesnt work well with galaxy s4. Please fix it. Or give me a refund.
reviews.author: Bernard Bryan Angelo Andres

reviews.comment: I just simply think it\'s great way better then the Apple Store.
reviews.author: Jesus Ontiveros

reviews.title: Worth the money
reviews.comment: Bunch of fun games in one including Fix-it Felix!
reviews.author: George Elliott

reviews.title: Turbo Time coming \"soon\"?
reviews.comment: After more than a year soon has arrived.
reviews.author: Craig Ashcraft

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: After the update, the app takes forever to load and I suspect it continues trying to load in the background, which causes my phone to overheat...
reviews.author: Francisco Pendrake

reviews.title: Love it but
reviews.comment: Love the games but now the game won\'t open. :(. Please fix.
reviews.author: Xiomara Ortiz

reviews.title: Xperia z Facebook issue
reviews.comment: Works well until the moment you link to Facebook, or have any online involvement. Fun set of mini games none the less
reviews.author: Shane Veckranges

reviews.title: Some good time wasters...
reviews.comment: None of the games are top notch, but the \'fix it felix jr\' game is pretty good. All in all, for $.99, its not a bad buy.
reviews.author: Cammie Hollinger

reviews.title: Great Games
reviews.comment: Fun games my daughters that are 9&11 love them so do I. Well priced not to expensive and they don\'t ask for more money like other games. Thank you to devs who made this game. I recommend playing these games.
reviews.author: Harmony Morris

reviews.title: Good update
reviews.comment: Now even more games Very fun for kids
reviews.author: spencer meadows

reviews.title: Keep getting invalid username
reviews.comment: Anytime I try to play it won\'t let me use any username or log in with Facebook. Any fix to this problem?
reviews.author: Lukus House

reviews.title: HTC One M7
reviews.comment: Awesome game but unfortunately now laggs so bad its in playable. Loading screens are fine, just animations lag on PAC ROM 4.3. Hours it cab be fixed, great set of games.
reviews.author: Tom Rowland

reviews.title: Bad lag
reviews.comment: This game doesn\'t work unless you have a quad core processor.  My Photon 4Q is dual core and lags like havoc.  I want a refund.
reviews.author: David Bui
